name: SqueakyAngel's Heavenly Hop
description:
Help SqueakyAngel reach her highest heavenly height. Jump from cloud to cloud collecting stars along the way. Watch out for the grumpy clouds! Dodge their raindrops then shoot them a rainbow to cheer them up!

How high can you get? How many stars can you collect? Can you beat your high scores in this infinite platformer game?

Keyboard controls:
to move - left and right arrow cursors,
to shoot a rainbow - space bar
